sections.title: TEST (test)
sections.content:
Is this how I write stuff underneath?

Is this how I link to Wine ??

Is this how I link to WINE#PlayOnLinux < - Nope.

Is this how linking pages works? Wine#PlayOnLinux

Tell me I have it... WINE#PlayOnLinx < - Im glad we have a sandbox!

This should work: WINE #PlayOnLinux

I GOT IT YES! TEST OF BOLD AND ITALICS

Is this how I [www.google.ca LINK] to an external site? < - Requires https??

Take me to google! < - does this work?

sections.title: still me
sections.content: Jeffhunt90 (talk) 23:53, 9 February 2022 (UTC)

sections.title: the buggy UEFI firmware of the Aspire 3 a315-56 model
sections.content:
So the firmware of this laptop is like really buggy, and you need to put the laptop to sleep ( suspend to ram ) to even see the internal storage connected to the SATA interface.

the command to do it:

```
echo mem > /sys/power/state
```

sections.title: considering to buy one: DON'T
sections.content:
seriously, do not buy Acer laptops, already had a horrible Linux experience with this one.

I guess its too much to ask of Acer to see my internal storage without having to constantly put it to sleep and waking it up?

And of course, windows 10 works without a single problem, BecauseNonWindowsUsersAreNotPeople,AmIRightGuys

God bless Asus, their firmware had its bugs, but it wasn't this bad.

10/10, would definitely throw my laptop out of the window again -IGN
